```{r set up, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data("iris")
```

This is my first Shiny App creation that wasn't a direct copy of a video tutorial. I chose the iris data set and learned to add photos. This was my final project for the fall 2022 semester of Advanced Stats at Fresno Pacific University.


Iris Shiny App link and information

[Link Here](https://49amdf-carmen-garcia.shinyapps.io/IrisProject/)

```{r echo=FALSE}
cor.test(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Sepal.Width)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data = iris) +
  geom_histogram(mapping = aes(x = Sepal.Length), binwidth = 0.5)

```
